com.epoch.genericQTypes

Class ClickImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.genericQTypes.ClickImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClickConstants

    public class ClickImage
extends Object
implements ClickConstants
    Holds a response to a clickable image question.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[][] allCoords

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClickImage

        public ClickImage(String response)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        response - the response; if in XML format, must have ", &, <, and > encoded as their &quot;, &amp;, &lt;, and &gt;, and other non-ASCII characters encoded as numerical CERs

    • Method Detail

      • debugPrint

        private static void debugPrint(Object... msg)

      • parseXML

        private void parseXML(Node node)
        Converts a node derived from XML into an array of marks and an array of corresponding text. The parser will convert CERs in the XML into the corresponding Unicode characters.
        Parameters:
        node - node derived from XML describing these marks

      • parseMark

        private void parseMark(Node node,
                       List<int[]> coordsList,
                       List<String> markStrsList)
        Parses a node representing a mark and adds the coordinates and text to the lists. The parser will convert CERs in the XML into the corresponding Unicode characters.
        Parameters:
        node - the node representing the mark
        coordsList - list of coordinates of all marks
        markStrsList - list of text of all marks

      • getColorAndMaxMarks

        public static String[] getColorAndMaxMarks(String qdStr)
        Splits the question data of a ClickImage question into color and number of marks.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        array containing color and number of marks
